attributes.action: ensure that those suffering from Coeliacs Disease are able to continue obtaining gluten-free food on prescription.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure that those suffering from Coeliacs Disease are able to continue obtaining gluten-free food on prescription."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14091.asp

Prime Minister's Office
